timeline.bodyText: Inefficient and incoherent with the implemented interface, ptDst should be used when present. When reprojecting lots of points, the machinery passes a single target point to avoid excessive object allocation.
timeline.author: aaime
aaime

timeline.message: addressed PR comment about returning ptDst
